title: Love Comedy's Rule: Kojirase Girls and Younger Boys
overview: Beautiful and stylish Ruri Kudzho works in the editorial office of electronic comics. Everyone thinks that she has a rich love experience because of her impeccable appearance and behavior. But in fact, she has not had a romantic relationship for a long time, and her knowledge of romance is mostly derived from the sojo manga. One day her young employee Mamia Ryo asks to give him advice in a love relationship.
